GSD.description:
btrfs: get rid of warning on transaction commit when using flushoncommit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.27 by commit 850a77c999b81dd2724efd2684068d6f90db8c16. For more details please see the references link.
